topics.body:
"@HeroInferno":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b4119e6368722876001083#post_55b4119e6368722876001083
I went in real quick after seeing his twitter say *"ALL DAY SFV MATCHES"*

And than left after I saw the Chat in Sub mode.

I really hate Sub mode. I like having the choice to comment or not. Plus I think Max's streams are funner that way. I Get to watch Max get hype and chat at the same time when I get hype too.

But he's recently been going Sub mode quiet a lot now a days. I mean I understand if the chat is getting rowdy and all. But it just seems like Sub Mod has been a thing more than usual now.

topics.body:
"@SuperSupermario24":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b403b16368720e9e00029c#post_55b403b16368720e9e00029c
[bq="SuperSupermario24"]"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b3ffdc6368725ee90044f5#post_55b3ffdc6368725ee90044f5
it's annoying how both mexican pesos and US dollars use the symbol $
was that the source of your confusion at first?[/bq]
The symbol with a single stroke is used to identify in general all American coins, with certainvariations, for example: Canadian dollar "C$" US Dollar "US$", same with the pesos Chilean Pesos, Argentinean, Colombian, etc.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b40a0863687228f40003e9#post_55b40a0863687228f40003e9
[bq="And Brother I Hurt People"]"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b40914636872289200030c#post_55b40914636872289200030c

I keep seeing reviews for Antman between "best thing Marvel's done in a really long time" and "meh"; why is that?[/bq]
I hear that it's really funny, but that's about the only positive thing I've heard personally. So from what I can gather: if you're looking for a guaranteed laugh, then go watch it, otherwise there's not much for you

Don't quote me on that, I haven't seen it myself yet
